member.name: T:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink
member.summary: the interface mapping required for the XmlRpc api of testlink. This interface is used by the TestLink class.
member.remarks: This class makes use of XML-RPC.NET Copyright (c) 2006 Charles Cook

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.getTestCase(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: get test case specification using external or internal id. returns last version

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.deleteExecution(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: delete an execution
member.returns: mixed $resultInfo [status] => true/false of success [id] => result id or error code [message] => optional message for error message string

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.getTotalsForTestPlan(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the summarized results grouped by platform
member.returns: map where every element has: * * 'type' => 'platform' * 'total_tc => ZZ * 'details' => array ( 'passed' => array( 'qty' => X) * 'failed' => array( 'qty' => Y) * 'blocked' => array( 'qty' => U) * ....)

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.sayHello
member.summary: simple Ping.

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.doesUserExist(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: checks user exists
member.returns: true if everything OK, otherwise error structure

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.checkDevKey(System.String)
member.returns: true if everything OK, otherwise error structure

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.ITestLink.getFullPath(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets full path from the given node till the top using nodes_hierarchy_table

member.name: T:Meyn.TestLink.TestCaseResultStatus
member.summary: represent the result of a test case execution

member.name: T:Meyn.TestLink.ActionOnDuplicatedName
member.summary: used for creating test cases to tell Testlink what to do if another test case is found with the same name

member.name: T:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink
member.summary: this is the proxy class to connect to TestLink. It provides a list of functions that map straight into the Tstlink API as it stands at V 1.9.2
member.remarks: This class makes use of XML-RPC.NET Copyright (c) 2006 Charles Cook

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: default constructor
member.param: developer key as provided by testlink
url of testlink API. Something like http://localhost/testlink/lib/api/xmlrpc.php

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: constructor with URL and log flag
member.param: developer key as provided by testlink
url of testlink API. Something like http://localhost/testlink/lib/api/xmlrpc.php
enable capture of lastRequest and lastResponse for debugging

member.name: P:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.LastRequest
member.summary: last xmlrpc request sent to testlink. only works if constructor was called with argument log set to true

member.name: P:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.LastResponse
member.summary: debug last response reseved from testlink xmlrpc call. Only works if constructor was called with argument log set to true

members.member:
process the response object returned by the Tstlink API for error messages. if it finds one or more error messages it throws a TLINK Exception ///
the actual message returned by testlink true if it found an error message that matches an errorCodes list false if there were no errorsreturns>

process the response object returned by the Tstlink API for error messages. if it finds one or more error messages it throws a TLINK Exception ///
the actual message returned by testlink true if it found an error message that matches an errorCodes list false if there were no errorsreturns> a list of integers that should not result in an exception to be processed

process the response object returned by the Tstlink API for error messages. if it finds one or more error messages it throws a TLINK Exception ///
the actual message returned by testlink true if it found an error message that matches an errorCodes list false if there were no errorsreturns> a list of integers that should not result in an exception to be processed

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.decodeErrors(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
member.summary: internal. try to conver the struct to an error message. Return null if it wasn't one
member.returns: a TLErrorMessage or null

member.summary: check that the state of the interface

member.summary: get a list of all builds for a testplan

member.summary: create a build for a testplan

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.GetLatestBuildForTestPlan(System.Int32)
member.summary: get the newest build for a test plan

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.ReportTCResult(System.Int32,System.Int32,Meyn.TestLink.TestCaseResultStatus,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Record the outcome of a test case execution
member.param: The result of the test (pass, fail or blocked)
Id of the platform. Optional if platform name is given
name of the platform. Optional if the platform id is given
if true, then last execution for (testcase,testplan,build,platform) will be overwritten.
(assumed to be true) defining whether to guess optinal params or require them explicitly default is true
any notes or info to be added to the description field
If not given, then highest build id willl be used
Id for a bug if used in conjunction with a defect tracker

member.name: M:Meyn.TestLink.TestLink.UploadExecutionAttachment(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uploads an attachment for an execution.
member.remarks: The attachment content must be Base64 encoded by the client before sending it.
member.param: The file name of the Attachment (e.g.:notes.txt)
The file type of the Attachment (e.g.: text/plain)
The content (Base64 encoded) of the Attachment
member.returns: An AttachmentRequestResponse

member.summary: get the last execution result

member.returns: a GeneralResult
